title: Motto Aishite Aisare Nakucchane!
original_name: もっと愛して愛されなくっちゃね！
sinopse: Mako, the very energetic high school student who believes that nothing is more important than love, is back! She was supposed to have a happy life with Shinya whom she fell in love with at first sight, but...!? (Source: M-U)
